articles.title: Hillsong Church founder found not guilty of concealing his father's child sex crimes - NPR
articles.description: Brian Houston was ruled not guilty Thursday of an Australian charge of concealing his father's child sex crimes. He resigned from his church roles after being charged two years ago.
articles.content:
Hillsong church founder Brian Houston arrives Thursday at the Downing Centre Local Court in Sydney. He was ruled not guilty of a charge of concealing his father's child sex crimes.
Bianca De Marchi/… [+3668 chars]

articles.author: Clare Brennan
articles.title: Top Candidates to Replace Vlatko Andonovski As USWNT Coach - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: England’s Sarina Wiegman, Australia’s Tony Gustavsson and OL Reign coach Laura Harvey lead a short list of candidates U.S. Soccer should consider as the next USWNT coach.
articles.content: Harvey has been in this position before, having been a top candidate for the USWNT manager job in 2019. Ultimately, Andonovski got the gig, but USWNT general manager Kate Markgraf spearheaded the int… [+1540 chars]
